name: Bardo - Facette
description:
(This Bardo token comes with Facette as a new companion for the first collector*)

•

Along the rivershore 
I saw her face
I walked very far 
until the sea
as I realized
it was myself.

•

Facette, 
quand endolori d'un réveil incertain
il nous semble encore préférable de dormir.

Ἑρμογένης / L'Amicale des Ombres - Bardo Puppets, 2021


*Worldwide free shipping of the physical puppet (40x20x29 cm) for the first owner of the nft.
